description.name: shurjoPay
description.tagline: Accept payments online supporting a wide range of industries.
description.long:
shurjoPay's payment gateway provides all type of card and mfs payment acquisition of local as well as international debit and credit cards.

[Click to learn more and signup](https://shurjopay.com.bd)
features: Accept all major debit/credit cards as well as MFS in Bangladesh
